net.kuujo.vertigo.network

Interface ComponentConfigurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComponentConfig<T>, ConnectionConfig, ModuleConfig, NetworkConfig, VerticleConfig

    public interface ComponentConfigurable
    Component container.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Detail

      • addComponent

        <T extends ComponentConfig> T addComponent(T component)
        Adds a component to the network.
        Parameters:
        component - The component to add.
        Returns:
        The added component configuration.

      • addComponent

        <T extends ComponentConfig<T>> T addComponent(String name,
                                            String moduleOrMain)
        Adds a module to the network.
        Parameters:
        name - The component name. This will be used as the basis for internal component addresses.
        moduleName - The module name.
        Returns:
        The new module configuration.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the module name is not a valid module identifier.

      • addComponent

        <T extends ComponentConfig<T>> T addComponent(String name,
                                            String moduleOrMain,
                                            org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject config)
        Adds a module to the network.
        Parameters:
        name - The component name. This will be used as the basis for internal component addresses.
        moduleName - The module name.
        config - The module configuration. This configuration will be made available as the verticle configuration within deployed module instances.
        Returns:
        The new module configuration.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the module name is not a valid module identifier.

      • addComponent

        <T extends ComponentConfig<T>> T addComponent(String name,
                                            String moduleOrMain,
                                            int instances)
        Adds a module to the network.
        Parameters:
        name - The component name. This will be used as the basis for internal component addresses.
        moduleName - The module name.
        instances - The number of module instances. If multiple instances are defined, groupings will be used to determine how messages are distributed between multiple component instances.
        Returns:
        The new module configuration.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the module name is not a valid module identifier.

      • addComponent

        <T extends ComponentConfig<T>> T addComponent(String name,
                                            String moduleOrMain,
                                            org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject config,
                                            int instances)
        Adds a module or verticle component to the network.
        Parameters:
        name - The component name. This will be used as the basis for internal component addresses.
        moduleOrMain - The component module name or verticle main.
        config - The component configuration. This configuration will be made available as the verticle configuration within deployed module instances.
        instances - The number of component instances. If multiple instances are defined, groupings will be used to determine how messages are distributed between multiple component instances.
        Returns:
        The new module configuration.

      • removeComponent

        <T extends ComponentConfig<T>> T removeComponent(T component)
        Removes a component from the network.
        Parameters:
        component - The component to remove.
        Returns:
        The removed component configuration.

        Removes a component from the network.
        Parameters:
        name - The component name.
        Returns:
        The removed component configuration.

        ModuleConfig addModule(String name,
                     String moduleName,
                     int instances)
        Adds a module to the network.
        Parameters:
        name - The component name. This will be used as the basis for internal component addresses.
        moduleName - The module name.
        instances - The number of module instances. If multiple instances are defined, groupings will be used to determine how messages are distributed between multiple component instances.
        Returns:
        The new module configuration.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the module name is not a valid module identifier.

      • addModule

        ModuleConfig addModule(String name,
                     String moduleName,
                     org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject config,
                     int instances)
        Adds a module to the network.
        Parameters:
        name - The component name. This will be used as the basis for internal component addresses.
        moduleName - The module name.
        config - The module configuration. This configuration will be made available as the verticle configuration within deployed module instances.
        instances - The number of module instances. If multiple instances are defined, groupings will be used to determine how messages are distributed between multiple component instances.
        Returns:
        The new module configuration.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the module name is not a valid module identifier.

      • addVerticle

        Adds a verticle to the network.
        Parameters:
        name - The component name. This will be used as the basis for internal component addresses.
        main - The verticle main.
        config - The verticle configuration. This configuration will be made available as the verticle configuration within deployed module instances.
        Returns:
        The new verticle configuration.

      • addVerticle

        VerticleConfig addVerticle(String name,
                         String main,
                         int instances)
        Adds a verticle to the network.
        Parameters:
        name - The component name. This will be used as the basis for internal component addresses.
        main - The verticle main.
        instances - The number of verticle instances. If multiple instances are defined, groupings will be used to determine how messages are distributed between multiple component instances.
        Returns:
        The new verticle configuration.

      • addVerticle

        VerticleConfig addVerticle(String name,
                         String main,
                         org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject config,
                         int instances)
        Adds a verticle to the network.
        Parameters:
        name - The component name. This will be used as the basis for internal component addresses.
        main - The verticle main.
        config - The verticle configuration. This configuration will be made available as the verticle configuration within deployed module instances.
        instances - The number of verticle instances. If multiple instances are defined, groupings will be used to determine how messages are distributed between multiple component instances.
        Returns:
        The new verticle configuration.
